title: Casing Running Operations - AI Probing Questions

questions.question: Your centralization shows 67% standoff - cementing typically needs 75% for good displacement. Is this acceptable?
questions.expectedResponse: Cement displacement analysis or design change

questions.question: Surge calculations show 0.4 ppg ECD increase at max run speed - you have 0.3 ppg margin to frac. What's your running speed?
The programme shows auto-fill float equipment but I don't see it on the rig inventory - has this been ordered?
If casing gets stuck 500m from bottom, what's your contingency? Can you cement at that depth?
Make-up torque is 35,000 ft-lbs but rig tongs are rated to 30,000 - confirm you have correct equipment?
Fill-up schedule shows every 5 joints - what's the maximum allowable under-fill before surge risk?
Liner hanger setting depth is 50m inside previous shoe - what if you can't get to depth?
Thread compound is Jet-Lube 21 but connection is VAM TOP - is this the approved compound?
Your casing drift is 8.681" but the programme shows 8.75" drift requirement - confirm dimensions?
Centralizer spacing is 1 per 3 joints but deviation is 60Â° - is this adequate for this inclination?
If circulation is lost while running casing, what's your response - continue or pull back?
questions.expectedResponse: Decision criteria for losses while running

questions.question: Pickup/slackoff limits are 50 klbs - what's the maximum depth you can verify casing is free?
